sources.title: The Ladykillers
sources.description: Five oddball criminals planning a bank robbery rent rooms on a cul-de-sac from an octogenarian widow under the pretext that they are classical musicians.

metadata.Plot: A gang planning a 'job' find themselves living with a little old lady, who thinks they are musicians. When the gang set out to kill Mrs Wilberforce, they run into one problem after another, and they get what they deserve.
metadata.Actors: Alec Guinness, Peter Sellers, Cecil Parker
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 2 wins & 5 nominations total
